item.title: The Best Printers for Home and Office: Brother, HP, and More
item.description: It's a boring tool, but you need one. Here are the best home printers we have tested, from ink tank to lasers.

item.title: The Best Gifts for Book Lovers (2025): E-Readers, Cozy Accessories, Book Sets
item.description: Any one of these gift ideas will make your favorite bookworm very happy, from e-readers and accessories to cozy reading essentials.

item.title: What Are Gravel Running Shoes? (2025)
item.description: This new-ish hybrid between trail runners and road runners is designed for less technical terrain and the occasional road run.

item.title: As Key Talent Abandons Apple, Meet the New Generation of Leaders Taking On the Old Guard
item.description: With “hardware guy” John Ternus as frontrunner for the next CEO, can Apple overtake its ex-employees at OpenAI and Meta?

item.title: This AI Model Can Intuit How the Physical World Works
item.description: The V-JEPA system uses ordinary videos to understand the physics of the real world.
